title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
description: A middle schooler in New York City, Emily Elizabeth is bullied by her peers at a fancy private school and lives with her mother Maggie. Her only friend is the geeky student, Owen Yu. She is left in the hands of her homeless and irresponsible uncle Casey while Maggie goes to Chicago for a business trip.

imdbInfo.ratingReason: Rated PG for impolite humor, thematic elements and mild action
